description: This file defines the RegisterActivity class for an Android app, handling user registration through a UI with username and password inputs, making API calls to register a new user, and navigating to the login activity upon success.

classes.name: RegisterActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class responsible for handling user registration.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and defines click behaviors for registration and login UI elements.
